title: Ezyapply Chrome Extension
description:
Ezyapply is your all-in-one career growth platform, letting you create tailored resumes in one click, generate AI-personalized cover letters, and access job insights directly from the Chrome extension—no more switching between tools and job pages.
With Ezyapply’s Chrome Extension, you can manage your applications seamlessly, stay organized, and maintain momentum throughout your job search.

☆☆WHAT YOU’LL GET☆☆
JOB TRACKER
JOB INSIGHTS
TAILORED RESUME & COVER LETTER
